headline: The Hartford Declares Quarterly Dividend Of $375 Per Share Of Series G Preferred Stock
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., December 17, 2025--The Hartford’s Board of Directors today declared a dividend of $375 on each of the Series G preferred stock (equivalent to $0.375 per depository share) payable on Feb. 17, 2026, to Series G preferred stock shareholders of record at the close of business on Feb. 2, 2026.
